name: The Association of Independent Accredited Verifiers
goal:
The Purposes of the Association are:

1. To provide independent verification services under Regulation (EU) 2015/757 on the Monitoring, Reporting and Verification of carbon dioxide emissions from maritime transport (EU MRV)

2. To be able to provide efficient and competitive independent verification services to any ship and shipping company worldwide regardless of Flag, country of ownership or Class, under the EU MRV as well as under the IMO Data Collection System (IMO DCS) established under MARPOL, Annex VI, Regulation 22A.

The Objectives of the Association are to support our common purpose with regards to the relevant authorities:

1. With the European Commission with regards to the implementation of Regulation 2015/757, Directive 2009/15/EC and Regulation 391/2009, and relevant guidelines

2. With the International Maritime Organization (IMO) with regards to the implementation of MARPOL, Annex VI, Regulation 22A, and relevant guidelines

3. With the Flag administrations with regards to the implementation of MARPOL, Annex VI, Regulation 22A, Directive 2009/15/EC and Regulation 391/2009, and relevant guidelines

4. With the National Accreditation Bodies (NABs) with regards to the implementation of the ISO 14065 standard, and relevant guidelines
